title: Set blank tooltip in chart title will cause exception when preview.
OB: When setting a blank tooltip in the chart title and previewing it, an exception occurs.
EB:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 
1. Create a new simple chart.
2. Enable title interactivity.
3. Set the tooltip text to be blank.
4. Click the Add button.
SR:
To resolve the issue:
1. Handle the case when the tooltip text is blank in the chart title.
2. Ensure that no exception occurs when previewing a chart with a blank tooltip.
